Text: BREAKING: Ontario's ombudsman has launched an investigation into the province's oversight of long-term care homes in #COVID19 pandemic. It will focus on whether @ONThealth + @ONlongtermcare oversight "is adequate to ensure the safety of residents ; staff."https://t.co/9V1MVdldPn

All interstate travels by individuals remain prohibited except for essential travels and the movement of goods and services. - Dr. Sani Aliyu, National Coordinator, PTF on COVID-19.#PTFBriefing #COVID19Update#COVID19

We didn't forget about Mike Brown. Snowden. Manning. Wikileaks. Drone war. Should we continue?You expanded the surveillance state just like Trump. The difference: the mainstream media liked you. https://t.co/UHNSOO4izq
The Utah Medicaid program will now cover #COVID19 testing costs for uninsured people in our state. Here's the announcement from the Department of Health. @abc4utah https://t.co/kwq8iJCtZd

For those who say, "Trump isn't doing enough to stop this," you need to familiarize yourself with Federalism and the 10th Amendment.This is a state's rights issue. It is up to states and cities to call in the National Guard, not the President to overrun cities with the Army.
The nationwide curfew will remain in place but the timing of this will be reduced from 10pm to 4am. - Dr. Sani Aliyu, National Coordinator, PTF on COVID-19.#PTFBriefing #COVID19Update#COVID19

It is saddening to see such untimely demise at 39 due to Covid. May his soul rest in peace. Other day it was Bejan Daruwallah. But young; fit succumbing to Covid is scary. Hope people exercise caution 'coz Corona virus doesn't understand that it has to go as we ease the lockdown.

Kerala's Higher education minister Mr. Jaleel is teaching History via online. New academic year has been started in Kerala. Students can attend class through online and TV. This must be the priority of every govt! Good job Kerala ❤️❤️#KeralaModel #Covid19 https://t.co/Kl85brQIjz

A new #Ebola outbreak detected in western #DRC, near Mbandaka, Équateur province. @MinSanteRDC has identified 6 cases, of which 4 people have died. The country is also in final phase of battling Ebola in eastern DRC, #COVID19 ; the world's largest measles outbreak.
